C

calculateNumberOfDiceAllowed(String, String, String, String) - Method in class Player.Player
The public method will calculate the number of dice for attacker or defender depending on the number of armies that player has,will decide whether to roll 1,2 or 3 dice.
calculateReinforcementArmies() - Method in class Player.Player
This method Calculate's the number of reinforcements that the player gets in each turn of the game.
canattackFromThisCountry(String) - Method in class Player.Player
The public method to check if a player can attack from this country which is present here.
canExchangeCards() - Method in class Player.Player
The boolean method canExchangeCards will gives clear clarity whether a player can exchange the card or not.
Card - package Card
 
Card - Class in Card
This class is the Card class and it has CardType in which three different types of army cards are are mentioned.
Card(Map.Territory) - Constructor for class Card.Card
This is the default constructor of the Card class and will be used to create the cardtype and territory
Card.CardType - Enum in Card
 
cardExchangeSelection(Player) - Static method in class Views.CardExchangeView
This method will display the selection of card's that can exchanged between the player's in the game.
cardExchangeValue - Static variable in class Card.Card
cardExchangeValue is intialized to 5
CardExchangeView - Class in Views
This method will implement from observer and also display's the Card exchange process between the player's in the game.Updates when the observer notifies it's changes.
CardExchangeView() - Constructor for class Views.CardExchangeView
 
cardExchangeViewOpen - Variable in class Player.Player
public boolean cardExchangeViewOpen will take true or false value for the variable if the player wants to open card exchange view.
cards - Variable in class Player.Player
list of cards.
checkDefenderArmiesNumberZero(String, String) - Method in class Player.Player
The method will check the number of armies in the defender whether zero or not.
continent - Variable in class Map.Map.Territory
 
continents - Variable in class Map.Map
List of continents in map.
countryNameWithContinentAndArmy(Map.Territory, boolean) - Method in class Views.WorldDominationView
This method will display the namee of the country along with the continent and there armies.
createNewMap() - Static method in class Driver.Main
This method lets user to build a new map and then displays the full map to the user on the screen.
currentGamePhase - Variable in class Player.Player
public GamePhase currentGamePhase will take one of the phases mentioned in GamePhase.
